question.title: Pattern 14
question.content:
Geek is very fond of patterns. Once, his teacher gave him a pattern to solve. He gave Geek an integer n and asked him to build a pattern.

Help Geek to build the pattern.

 

Example 1:

Input: 5

Output:
A
AB
ABC
ABCD
ABCDE

 

Your Task:

You don't need to input anything. Complete the function printTriangle() which takes  an integer n  as the input parameter and print the pattern.

Constraints:

  • 1<= N <= 20

rephrased.body: Given an integer 'n', construct a pattern where each line represents a sequence of letters starting from 'A'. The first line contains 'A', the second line contains 'AB', the third line contains 'ABC', and so on, until the 'n'th line which contains 'ABCDE...upto nth alphabet'.

testcases.explanation: The pattern is built up to the 5th alphabet for an input of 5.
